description: A complete HTML webpage implementing a database visualizer interface with client-side JavaScript for fetching and displaying database info, tables, and data.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches list of databases and populates the sidebar

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the list of databases and resets UI states

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses database to show tables

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches and displays data for selected table

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Generates HTML table from data array

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Creates table cell content based on value type

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses content within a cell
